item.title: Competing for a Cybersecurity Role
item.description: Introduction Getting into Cybersecurity Competition for the Role Boosting your Chances Get a Referral Experience Certs and Degrees Sharpen and Focus your Resume Volunteer Work What certs should I get? No Response from the Employer Introduction I spend a good amount of time in discords where people ask about what it takes to join a SOC, I figured it might be best to just write out all of my recommendations in one big post and ship it over.
